00020 #ifdef SERIAL_POSIX
00021 #include <termios.h>
00022 #include <unistd.h>
00023 #include <fcntl.h>
00024 #include <errno.h>
00025  
00026 #define MIN_BUFFER_SIZE 256
00027 #define TTY_WAIT 1 //ms
00028 
00029 XPosixSerialPort::XPosixSerialPort(XCharInterface *interface)
00030     : XPort(interface), m_scifd(-1)
00031 {
00032 
00033 }
00034 XPosixSerialPort::~XPosixSerialPort()
00035 {
00036     if(m_scifd >= 0) close(m_scifd);
00037 }
00038 void
00039 XPosixSerialPort::open() throw (XInterface::XCommError &)
00040 {
00041     struct termios ttyios;
00042     speed_t baudrate;
00043     if((m_scifd = ::open(QString(m_pInterface->port()->to_str()).local8Bit(),
00044                          O_RDWR | O_NOCTTY | O_SYNC | O_NONBLOCK)) == -1)
00045     {
00046         throw XInterface::XCommError(KAME::i18n("tty open failed"), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00047     }
00048     
00049     tcsetpgrp(m_scifd, getpgrp());
00050       
00051     bzero(&ttyios, sizeof(ttyios));
00052 //      tcgetattr(m_scifd, &ttyios);
00053 
00054     switch(static_cast<int>(m_pInterface->serialBaudRate()))
00055     {
00056     case 2400: baudrate = B2400; break;
00057     case 4800: baudrate = B4800; break;
00058     case 9600: baudrate = B9600; break;
00059     case 19200: baudrate = B19200; break;
00060     case 38400: baudrate = B38400; break;
00061     case 57600: baudrate = B57600; break;
00062     case 115200: baudrate = B115200; break;
00063     case 230400: baudrate = B230400; break;
00064     default:
00065         throw XInterface::XCommError(KAME::i18n("Invalid Baudrate"), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00066     }
00067 
00068     cfsetispeed(&ttyios, baudrate);
00069     cfsetospeed(&ttyios, baudrate);
00070     cfmakeraw(&ttyios);
00071     ttyios.c_cflag &= ~(PARENB | CSIZE);
00072     ttyios.c_cflag |= HUPCL | CLOCAL | CS8 | CREAD;
00073     if(m_pInterface->serialStopBits() == 2)
00074         ttyios.c_cflag |= CSTOPB;
00075     ttyios.c_lflag &= ~(ICANON | ECHO | ECHOE | ISIG); //non-canonical mode
00076     ttyios.c_iflag |= IGNBRK | IGNPAR;
00077     ttyios.c_cc[VMIN] = 0; //no min. size
00078     ttyios.c_cc[VTIME] = 30; //3sec time-out
00079     if(tcsetattr(m_scifd, TCSAFLUSH, &ttyios ) < 0)
00080         throw XInterface::XCommError(KAME::i18n("stty failed"), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00081     
00082     if(fcntl(m_scifd, F_SETFL, (~O_NONBLOCK) & fcntl(m_scifd, F_GETFL)) == - 1)
00083     {
00084         throw XInterface::XCommError(KAME::i18n("tty open failed"), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00085     }
00086 }
00087 void
00088 XPosixSerialPort::send(const char *str) throw (XInterface::XCommError &)
00089 {
00090     std::string buf(str);
00091     buf += m_pInterface->eos();
00092     this->write(buf.c_str(), buf.length());
00093 }
00094 void
00095 XPosixSerialPort::write(const char *sendbuf, int size) throw (XInterface::XCommError &)
00096 {
00097     ASSERT(m_pInterface->isOpened());
00098       
00099     for (;;) {
00100         int ret = tcflush(m_scifd, TCIFLUSH);
00101         if(ret < 0) {
00102             if(errno == EINTR) {
00103                 dbgPrint("Serial, EINTR, try to continue.");
00104                 continue;
00105             }
00106             throw XInterface::XCommError(KAME::i18n("tciflush error."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00107         }
00108         break;
00109     }
00110       
00111     msecsleep(TTY_WAIT);
00112    
00113     int wlen = 0;
00114     do {
00115         int ret = ::write(m_scifd, sendbuf, size - wlen);
00116         if(ret < 0) {
00117             if(errno == EINTR) {
00118                 dbgPrint("Serial, EINTR, try to continue.");
00119                 continue;
00120             }
00121             else
00122             {
00123                 throw XInterface::XCommError(KAME::i18n("write error"), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00124             }
00125         }
00126         wlen += ret;
00127         sendbuf += ret;
00128     } while (wlen < size);
00129 }
00130 void
00131 XPosixSerialPort::receive() throw (XInterface::XCommError &)
00132 {
00133     ASSERT(m_pInterface->isOpened());
00134     
00135 //   for(;;) {
00136 //        if(tcdrain(m_scifd) < 0) {
00137 //            dbgPrint("tcdrain failed, continue.");
00138 //            continue;
00139 //        }
00140 //        break;
00141 //   }
00142 
00143     msecsleep(TTY_WAIT);
00144    
00145     buffer().resize(MIN_BUFFER_SIZE);
00146    
00147     const char *eos = m_pInterface->eos().c_str();
00148     unsigned int eos_len = m_pInterface->eos().length();
00149     unsigned int len = 0;
00150     for(;;)
00151     {
00152         if(buffer().size() <= len + 1) 
00153             buffer().resize(len + MIN_BUFFER_SIZE);
00154         int rlen = ::read(m_scifd, &buffer().at(len), 1);
00155         if(rlen == 0) {
00156             buffer().at(len) = '\0';
00157             throw XInterface::XCommError(KAME::i18n("read time-out, buf=;") + &buffer().at(0), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00158         }
00159         if(rlen < 0) {
00160             if(errno == EINTR) {
00161                 dbgPrint("Serial, EINTR, try to continue.");
00162                 continue;
00163             }
00164             else
00165                 throw XInterface::XCommError(KAME::i18n("read error"), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00166         }
00167         len += rlen;
00168         if(len >= eos_len) {
00169             if(!strncmp(&buffer().at(len - eos_len), eos, eos_len))
00170             {
00171                 break;
00172             }
00173         }
00174     }
00175     
00176     buffer().resize(len + 1);
00177     buffer().at(len) = '\0';
00178 }
00179 void
00180 XPosixSerialPort::receive(unsigned int length) throw (XInterface::XCommError &)
00181 {
00182     ASSERT(m_pInterface->isOpened());
00183    
00184 //   for(;;) {
00185 //        if(tcdrain(m_scifd) < 0) {
00186 //            dbgPrint("tcdrain failed, continue.");
00187 //            continue;
00188 //        }
00189 //        break;
00190 //   }
00191    
00192     msecsleep(TTY_WAIT);
00193    
00194     buffer().resize(length);
00195     unsigned int len = 0;
00196    
00197     while(len < length)
00198     {
00199         int rlen = ::read(m_scifd, &buffer().at(len), 1);
00200         if(rlen == 0)
00201             throw XInterface::XCommError(KAME::i18n("read time-out"), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00202         if(rlen < 0) {
00203             if(errno == EINTR) {
00204                 dbgPrint("Serial, EINTR, try to continue.");
00205                 continue;
00206             }
00207             else
00208                 throw XInterface::XCommError(KAME::i18n("read error"), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00209         }
00210         len += rlen;
00211     }
00212 }
